definition: upper reaches (of a river)/upper level/upper echelon/upstream
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to strive for mastery (idiom); aiming for the best result/to have high ambitions

sentences.english: The Chu general Zhuang Jiao entered the region from the upper Yangtze River and set himself up as "King of Dian".
sentences.chinese: 楚國的將軍莊郊從長江上游來到這裏自稱滇王。

sentences.english: Stay ahead and achieve low cost and superior customer attractiveness.
sentences.chinese: 永居上游，實現低成本與客戶的高認知度。

sentences.english: Each process should be agnostic of the processes in the upstream layers.
sentences.chinese: 每個流程應該不知道上游層中的流程。

sentences.english: They wandered the world and found half- made human beings.
sentences.chinese: 他們在世界上游蕩並創造出人類的半成品。

sentences.english: Each rive has its upward, middle and backward part.
sentences.chinese: 每條河流都有上游，中游和下游。

sentences.english: They went up the Severn from Bristol to Gloucester.
sentences.chinese: 他們向塞文河上游駛去，從布里斯托爾港到格洛斯特。

sentences.english: Close the shutoff valve upstream of the regulator.
sentences.chinese: 關閉調節閥上游的關斷閥。

sentences.english: Almost 170 vessels have been held up at the Zhuzhou section in the river's upper reaches.
sentences.chinese: 將近170艘船停在株洲地區，湘江河的上游河段。

sentences.english: Today, the only remaining trackers pulled tourists upstream.
sentences.chinese: 如今碩果僅存的縴夫將遊客拉到上游。

sentences.english: Purple Soil distributed widely in China, especially in upper reaches of the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 紫色土在我國分佈較廣，特別是長江上游地區。

sentences.english: Further strengthening soil-water conservation in upstream area of the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 要進一步加強上游地區的水土保持工作。

sentences.english: The distribution of Masson Pine forest is very wide in the upper ana middle reaches of Yangtse River.
sentences.chinese: 長江中上游地區馬尾松林的分佈非常廣泛。

sentences.english: And Coca-Cola managed to make itself one of the most widely distributed products of wartime.
sentences.chinese: 可口可樂更力爭上游，成爲戰時最暢銷產品之一。

sentences.english: A good student should have the determination to compete for first place.
sentences.chinese: 一個好學生要有爭上游的決心。

sentences.english: The evolution process of the Hualong Basin, one of fault basins in the upper reaches of the Yellow River .
sentences.chinese: 黃河上游的化隆盆地在第三紀期間爲古湖佔據。

sentences.english: The catchers were canoed back to their camp for up the river.
sentences.chinese: 捕獵者乘坐小獨木舟回到遠在河上游的營地。

definition: lower reaches (of a river)/lower level/lower echelon/downstream
the middle stretches of a river/middle level/middle echelon/midstream
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
period of low water level (winter in north China)
Irrawaddy or Ayeyarwaddy River, the main river of Myanmar (Burma)
industry chain (concept proposed by US scholar Michael Porter in 1985)
